news.title: Lithium Americas soars 65% as Trump administration seeks equity stake in Canadian miner
news.summary: It is the latest move by the White House to take direct ownership in the U.S. critical mineral supply chain. It is also the first time that the government has been involved in a direct way in the production of minerals.

news.title: Shooting at Dallas ICE detention facility leaves 'multiple injuries and fatalities': Noem
news.summary: "The shooter is deceased by a self-inflicted gun shot wound," Noem said in an X post confirming the attack. Noem: The shooter was killed by a "self-inflicts gun shot wounds"

news.title: The Trump administration is changing Covid, childhood vaccine recommendations – here’s what it means for you
news.summary: Health experts say there are steps Americans can take to navigate the new guidance and try to secure the vaccines they or their children want or need.

news.title: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell says league could renegotiate media deals as soon as 2026
news.summary: The NFL would need agreement from its media partners — Disney, Comcast's NBCUniversal, Paramount, Amazon and Fox — to start discussions earlier than planned.

news.title: Jimmy Kimmel returns after ABC suspension: 'Never my intention to make light' of Charlie Kirk's murder
news.summary: "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" returned to air Tuesday night, roughly one week after the late night show was suspended by Disney's ABC broadcast network.

news.title: This overlooked group of stocks might be your portfolio’s missing piece
news.summary: Midcap stocks can stand up to the market’s megacap giants. Midcap stocks have the potential to be the next Facebook or Google.

news.title: ‘I changed my will to deter vultures’: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Do I impoverish myself to qualify for Medicaid?
news.summary: “I pay my taxes and insurance, donate money and personal belongings,” she says. “I’m a good person. I’ve always been.”

news.title: What Jimmy Kimmel said in his first show back may not matter. Disney has already been hammered by the culture wars.
news.summary: The decision to pull Kimmel off the air sparked calls for a boycott from his supporters. The move to bring him back has angered conservatives, putting Disney in an unwinnable position.

news.title: Jimmy Kimmel has now returned to network TV. Other outspoken American workers may not be so fortunate.
news.summary: CNN.com's Jarrett Bellini reports on a new law that would allow employers to fire employees for their views on Charlie Kirk and Jimmy Kimmel. Bellini: The law would allow an employer to fire a worker for his or her views on Jimmy Kimmel and Charlie Kirk.

news.title: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
news.summary: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”
